Gangon:

Gangon smiled and kept his watch in the corner for any one uninvited to come
in....he rather liked BrightBlade and hoped she made Hell Beast's cut....of
course, he himself was not so great of a warrior, but he was the loyalest
and bravest guy they had.....so he stayed......for now.....he would NEVER do
anything to betray Hell Beast in ANY manner.....and he knew Hell Beast was
always right..no matter what!......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 10:25 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
> * BrightBlade stayed on her knees and kept her head bowed as she saw Hell
> Beast move from his seat and behind her, he was obviously very powerful in
> the eyes of his followers.
> She kept her attention on the patch of floor ahead of her as she heard
Hell
> Beast ask her the  question, she answered as best she could...*
>
> " My talents consist of hacking, spying, setting complicated traps,
weapons
> hot-wiring, repair, and making harm to the Maximals.
> My personal report indicates loyalty and trust, however, if a traitor is
> found within the same strong-hold as I, I'm the first one to slit his
> throat!
> I obey every command to the letter and ensure that my fellow team mates do
> it as well.
> I do not like failure!
> My pass times consist of exploring, occasional reading, repairing and
> experimenting with weapons that I have just built,and making trouble and
> just plain Hell for the Maximals.
> Is that all you wish to know, My Lord?"
>
>
